CheckerPage.addressesPlaceholder: Insert wallet addresses divided by line, comma, semicolon, tab or space
CheckerPage.concurrentFetches: Number of concurrent requests by address
CheckerPage.addressesPlaceholderDisabled: First enable address display by clicking on the header in the table

LayerZero.warning: WARNING: Due to the peculiarities of API LayerZeroScan in the table shows data only on the last 100 transactions of the wallet (the number of transactions is shown correctly). And also transactions are counted from 01-05-2024, the snapshot date.
